nodes.text: Reflec was an advanced, light-warping, sensor stopping polymer used on the armor of Republic Covert Ops clone troopers and Imperial Storm commandos.
The bounty hunter Mist also wore armor with a reflec coating, allowing her to gain the upper hand on her quarry.
Professional dancers and the staff at the Glow Dome wore reflec bodysuits, which absorbed and reflected the illumination in the club.
